## pack gen docs

Generate markdown docs of pack commands

### Synopsis

Generate markdown docs of pack commands

```
pack gen docs [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --dir string   the directory to write the doc. (default "/tmp/packdocs/")
  -h, --help         help for docs
```
